data.eml:eml: A new species of Physokermes Targioni Tozzetti (Hemiptera: Coccoidea: Coccidae) from Greece

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kozár, Ferenc, Gounari, Sofia, Hodgson, Chris, Fetyk, Kinga (2012): A new species of Physokermes Targioni Tozzetti (Hemiptera: Coccoidea: Coccidae) from Greece. Zootaxa 3566: 23-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210926
